biotools.summary: OCTID is a one-class learning-based Python package for tile-level tumor detection. OCTID can capture patterns from the available normal whole slide images (WSIs) to identify and remove normal tiles from the training dataset.

bioschemas.name: OCTID
bioschemas.summary: OCTID is a one-class learning-based Python package for tile-level tumor detection. OCTID can capture patterns from the available normal whole slide images (WSIs) to identify and remove normal tiles from the training dataset.
